title: 40 Perches Valuable Land for Sale at Ekala, Ja Ela.
details:
Available for Sale 40 Perches Land Situated at CTB Junction, Ekala, Ja – Ela. Good solid land with wide road access, suitable for both commercial and residential purpose. Close to Colombo – Negombo main road.
Convenience of being only minutes to Banks, Super Markets, Church, Temple, International & Government Schools, Hospitals.
